Freelance Web Design Barcelona

Hi my name is Lukasz and I am a Barcelona Web Design Service Freelancer, who provides affordable web design solutions for other freelancers, agencies, entrepreneurs or for your personal projects. I do web development, UI design, UX design & SEO Marketing. My Web Design service extend throughout the Barcelona area (including Girona, Tarragona, Montserrat, Santa Susana, Sitges, Vilanova i la Geltrú).

Since I am a Freelancer, I very often meet my lovely customers in Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera, because it is not so crowded like Barcelona’s touristic parts -la rambla-, especially in the summer months. However I am also able to work remotely from all parts of the world.

Inspiring Web Design & Development

My goal is to provide Barcelona with individualised solutions for web design, web development, wordpress customisation & search engine optimization (on-page as well as off-page seo).

Whether it be for an individual like an entrepreneur, a personal trainer, or a famous blogger. I can help you to fulfil your project with a personalized user interface design, a personal solution for hosting (without monthly costs) and I can make your website come alive with my favourite coding language - Javascript (ES6). Furthermore I can take a look at your homepage and provide it with an engaging User Experience. My goal is to leave the web a better place. Since I am already talking about User Experience, on thing that goes hand in hand with UX is SEO Marketing. SEO solves a VERY common problem most webmasters suffer from: traffic.

I am Barcelonas Freelancer here to help you with the online world. Don't hesitate to drop me a message.


My Web Design Services

I currently work with clients of several types of businesses: large-corporations, home-based business like bloggers, digital normads, local shops, artists, photographers, developers, stores and restaurants.

I provide web solutions for 2018 and every website that I code or that I design the User Interface for is made responsive, which means you can check it on your smartphone without any problems. I love to provide the whole area of barcelona with modern & excellent service & web design solutions.

  • - User Interface Design (Websites, Apps, Mobile Responsive Pages)
  • - Web Development (HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, Angular.JS)
  • - WordPress Solutions (Custom Made Plugins, adding functions, securing your data)
  • - Web Hosting Solutions (With a GitHub Account and a static website you can host your page without monthly costs!)
  • - SEO Marketing (On-Page SEO, Off-Page SEO, Content Marketing, Internal Linking, Title & Tag Adjustment, Skyscraper Content)
  • - Responsive Webdesign Making your Page perfectly fitted for smartphones and tablets.
